# I am Grateful

Every day, I have this never-ending thought process that reminds me I am not doing well in terms of health, time, career, relationships, responsibilities and the list goes on and on.
I keep scrolling through social media to furthermore deteriorate my state of mind and which in turn results in the feeling of guilt, low self-esteem.

    - My Mind works against me, not sure if that's the way it's supposed to be

I will keep another day to talk about why Minds works that way, today let's start fresh and focus on things I must and should be grateful for.

### To start with
- **Parents**
    - Both of my parents are in good health.
    - Could not have made it till here in life without them and their support
    - I do quarrel with them at times but as I am writing this I should stop that immediately and start cherishing them while I can.
    - My aunt(mausi) is my 2nd mother too, she's the same amount of care as my mother if not more.
    
- **Friends**
    - Boss this list is small and all of them are the best of the friends I could have made.
    - I'll not list supportive, caring, etc.. as this all is the bare minimum in friendship. they all go beyond this. In a true sense, they are my second family and I can blindly rely upon them for anything.
    - Yeah sometimes we have disagreements but that's required to see how strong the bond is.
    - I am happy that I can call them friends.
    
- **Time**
    - I envy time, I have not acquired the skill to manage it and if I do not do it now it's all coming back with huge debt which I'll never be able to repay.
    - I am grateful that I still have time to correct the wrongs. I shall, I will and I must.
    - I owe my success to time, and my failure to time as well.
    - I will try to respect each passing hour starting now.
    
- **Mind**
    - I'll not talk about it here today , it requires its own blog to talk about.
    - Current state ![empty_mind](data:image/jpeg;base64,).
    
- **Work**
    - All I can say about work is, that I am grateful to have work in my life to fulfill my days and needs.
    - I work at an excellent organization and have the privilege to work amongst excellent peers.
    - Nothing more at the moment I could have asked for.
    
- **Health**
    - Oh boy this is not at all in a good state. I have given health the last seat in this train of life.
    - I know before it's too late, it deserves the front row seat ... no scrap that, not front row. I need health to sit on my lap and help me drive through this one journey called life.
    - I acknowledge that I have not taken proper care of my health till now, but all of this stops today.
    - I will try to make small changes in my day-to-day life to improve my health, I'll try to be mindful of what I put in my mouth and will get enough exercise daily.
    - If I have excellent health, I will not be a burden on anyone till the end of my life.
    - Will also be able to help my family n friends in times of need both physically and mentally.
    - I'll work on my laziness, It has hampered a lot of opportunities in my life but no more. It stops today.
    

I would like to stop this for today. It was good to put my words in written than just bouncing around in my head all day.
I'll keep posting daily if I can.
Thank you for your time.

    -Take good care of yourself then only you can take care of others that are important to you.
